t: Amazon.com: Lion Brand Yarn Vanna's Choice Yarn, Yarn for Knitting and Crocheting, Black, 3 Pack
s: First of all, I love Vanna's Choice yarns. I purchased this colonial blue yarn specifically because of the band on the ball in the Ad. It's the old, or original, band that this yarn had so I thought it would also be the original yarn. Unfortunately the yarn that I received has the newer band on it. Fyi... even though the description states it's 860 109, it is actually 860 109E. The lot number is also different. Too some people that doesnt mean anything, but as a knitter...
